author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 1,686 uniformed personnel, from the police, fire and rescue services and the prison services departments will be awarded Tamil Nadu Chief Minister’s Constabulary Medals and Tamil Nadu Chief Minister’s Medals this year, in recognition of their outstanding devotion to duty.

While 1,500 personnel belonging to the police department in the rank of police constables, head constables and equivalent ranks would be given Tamil Nadu Chief Minister’s Constabulary Medals, another 120 from the fire and rescue services and 60 from the prison service departments would also receive Tamil Nadu Chief Minister’s Medals, a release said.

Six officers from technical and specialised services - two each from the police radio branch, dog squad and police photographers - would be given the Tamil Nadu Chief Minister’s Medal for Excellence. While officers in the rank of constables and head constables would receive Rs. 3,000, those in the rank of Sub Inspectors and Inspectors would receive Rs. 4,000.

The monthly medal allowance of Rs. 200 to the recipients would come into effect from February 1 , irrespective of their rank.
title: Chief Minister medal for 1,686 police personnel
